sourcesContent:
export type Course = {
  id: number;
  title: string;
  author: string;
  rating: number;
  ratingCount: number;
  price: number;
  oldPrice?: number;
  bestSeller?: boolean;
  category: string;
  imageUrl: string;
};

export const featuredCourses: Course[] = [
  {
    id: 1,
    title: "Modern React & TypeScript – Build Real Projects",
    author: "Jane Doe",
    rating: 4.7,
    ratingCount: 18432,
    price: 12.99,
